name: price_forecasts
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool marketci_analytics.
Tool description: Stock Market Endpoint for Price Forecasts, Probability, Cash Flow Models , and Peer Comps 
API description: Fetches an AI-generated price forecast for a given stock symbol over the next 3 months using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

symbol.description: The stock symbol for which the price forecast is to be generated.
